channel.title: 718 server help
channel.description:
Hey,
Im trying to have two owner accounts on my 718, but its only letting me have one. Does anyone know how to have two?
[code]public static final String[] OWNERS = { "my acc here", "2nd acc here" };[/code] I've tried this
[code]public static final String[] OWNERS = { "my acc here, 2nd acc here" };[/code] and this way.
It just doesnt recognize the 2nd acc.

item.title: 718 server help
item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

Thanks, we changed the boolean to loop the function. : like this. (Added in player.java)

public boolean isOwner() { for (String name : Settings.OWNERS) if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) return true; return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: 718 server help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You will need to loop through the array to confirm someone is an owner before using it, search for something like OWNERS[0] and use the loop idea. You could also make it into a function isOwner(String name).

for (String name : OWNERS) { if (thisPlayer.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { // ... return; // to avoid continuing the loop } }

There are better ways to do this (I would sticks with the rights system) but yeah.

Read full topic
